amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Skelton amendment which would lift the restriction against higher expenditures for missile defense than the amount spent in 1995.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Spence to the Skelton amendment (A005).

Mr. Volkmer raised a point of order against the Spence amendment (A006). Mr. Volkmer stated that the Spence amendment to the Skelton amendment was non germane and was, therefore, in violation of the rules of the House. Point of order overruled by the Chair.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spence amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 204 (Roll no. 138).
